Public Function GetPolicyEvaluationsAsync (project As Guid, artifactId As String, Optional includeNotApplicable As Nullable(Of Boolean) = Nothing, Optional top As Nullable(Of Integer) = Nothing, Optional skip As Nullable(Of Integer) = Nothing, Optional userState As Object = Nothing, Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of List(Of PolicyEvaluationRecord))

member this.GetPolicyEvaluationsAsync : Guid * string * Nullable<bool> * Nullable<int> * Nullable<int> * obj * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Collections.Generic.List<Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Policy.WebApi.PolicyEvaluationRecord>>
MemberSignature.Usage: policyHttpClient.GetPolicyEvaluationsAsync (project, artifactId, includeNotApplicable, top, skip, userState, cancellationToken)

Docs.param: A string which uniquely identifies the target of a policy evaluation.

Some policies might determine that they do not apply to a specific pull request. Setting this parameter to true will return evaluation records even for policies which don't apply to this pull request.
The number of policy evaluation records to retrieve.
The number of policy evaluation records to ignore. For example, to retrieve results 101-150, set top to 50 and skip to 100.
The cancellation token to cancel operation.
Docs.summary: [Preview API] Retrieves a list of all the policy evaluation statuses for a specific pull request.
